00017 TestCaseEvent_1::TestCaseEvent_1(void) :
00018         TestCaseGenericSetUp(ID_EVENT*10+1,"TestCaseEvent_1") {
00019                 return;
00020 }
00021 
00022 void TestCaseEvent_1::runTestCase(void) {
00023 
00024    DC_Event* pEvt = new DC_Event();
00025 
00026    // Set the event attributes
00027    pEvt->setTimeStamp(1);
00028    pEvt->setEventType((TD_EventType)2);
00029 
00030    // Check that the event attributes have correct values
00031         if ( (pEvt->getTimeStamp() != 1) ||
00032          (pEvt->getEventType() != 2) )
00033         {       setTestResult(TEST_FAILURE, "Incorrect event attribute values");
00034                 return;
00035         }
00036 
00037         setTestResult(TEST_SUCCESS,"Test Successful");
00038         return;
00039 }
